body.name: WOLFANT Full Grain Leather Belt,100% Italian Real Solid Leather
features: Fabric type 100% Real Solid Full Grain Leather

[Full Grain]: This solid belts is handmade of 100% Italian Full Grain Leather– NO Fillers, NO Bonding, one single piece of 1.5" top Real Solid cowhide, wont break, wont split. The quality of this leather ensures a long-lasting life and durability.

[Aesthetic Buckle]: Unlike a common buckle, the anaglyph of heavy duty metal buckle makes it look more aesthetic.Combined with exquisite handmade, this cowhide belt will serve as a fine accessory to any jeans, casual, work pants, business slacks& more.You can be sure to never go out of style with the classic yet stylish design of belt.

[Perfect Fit]: There are 7 holes on the mens belt to make belt fits more waistline size. Each product comes with a puncher so that you can remove the belt head to adjust the belt length according to your waist size.

[Gift Box]: Experience premium with WOLFANT! As luxury packaging comes as standard! WOLFANT high quality men's belt is a great gift for boyfriend, husband, father and male colleagues as birthday gift or anniversary gift.
[100% Guarantee]: Any product issue makes you dissatisfy with this men's leather belt, let us know and we will make it right. Full Refund or a Free Replacement, whichever You Prefer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exquisite Gift Light Luxury and Elegance A belt is very important to sharpen men's personal style and taste.The light luxury style with full and rich texture will satisfy your needs on different occasions.

Previous page Ergonomic Buckle Unlike a flat buckle, the curve of heavy duty metal buckle makes it fit the waist curve. One Piece Leather NO Fillers, NO Bonding, one single piece of 1.5" top Real Solid cowhide, wont break, wont split. Superb Oil Edge After many pure hand grinding, the oil edge is exquisite and durable. Classic Timeless Fashion jeans belt for men that will become ideal accessory to wear as an everyday belt. Next page 1 Ergonomic Buckle 2 One Piece Leather 3 Superb Oil Edge 4 Classic Timeless

How wide is this belt and how thick is the leather? The belt has a width of 1.5", which is suitable for most trousers and has enough support, which is very suitable for men; WOLFANT has chosen a thickness of 0.15" full-grain leather, about 4 mm, it has good resistance Shapeshifting ability. Can this belt be adjusted for shorter length? How to choose the right size? Yes, when your figure gets thinner, you just unscrew the assembly, cut, and re-drill the assembly. Adjusting the length of the belt can be done in a few simple steps.You can refer to our sixth picture to choose the suitable belt length. Is it 100% full grain leather? Is it Italian full grain leather? Yes. The leather made in Italy, this belt is crafted from 100% full grain leather – NO Fillers, NO Bonding. You can find some evidence from the surface of the leather, including skin lines, minor wrinkles and scars. We have kept the original style. How can I clean or care for my Belt? Full grain leather is not suitable for washing and usually it does not need to be washed. If you find stains on it, you can wipe it with a dry towel. Or you can also use leather maintenance oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE IT!!!!! ❤️
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Hey there!I totally splurged to get this belt.I love the HIGH quality of the leather. I've never had any Italian leather goods, but I'm sold on this belt.You know how that belts are usually very flexible and must to be pulled through the belt loops and around you? Well this ⅛" this leather belt STAYS CURLED and IT wraps ITSELF around you! I've never seen or heard the likes of that. It's amazing! And it fits so well too. And the belt buckle itself is curved to fit your waist, which helps with it not poking into my belly (I have a "Dad-bod" lol!).Oh! The belt also comes with a "leather punch" (a striking tool) that you can place over the belt and punch into it (by hitting the non sharp end with a hammer) to make a new custom placed hole if you want or need the belt to fit to a certain size. I was so surprised to find that in the box that it came in.Overall... This is THE MOST PHENOMENAL belt that I've EVER had. It made me wonder what it's like to be wealthy and to have these things available to you for your entire lifetime. Must be nice! I've never spent this much on a belt, but it's so worth it.I also used my Prime Chase credit card rewards points and brought the price down to next to nill. Buying Christmas presents paid off immensely. I was very surprised to find that I had gotten enough back to buy this and most of another nice item.Buy the belt if you can afford it, it's WELL WORTH the money and it'll last a lifetime of it's taken care of, I'm sure.Oh, and the colors that you have available to you to choose from are varied and gorgeous!I hope that this review has helped you with considering your possible purchase. God bless! ☝️😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality & Attention to Detail
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the few products that I've purchased over the last decade in which the business obviously pays attention to detail and takes pride in the product that they make.Attention to details:1) two loops so that the end of the belt doesn't flap;2) an included tool for customizing the length of the belt (not needed in my case but unbelievable that it's even included);3) and last but not least this inexpensive belt was shipped in a full length sleeve to protect the leather from being scuffed.I like the simplicity of the design - no fancy stitching; it's all about the quality of the leather.I purchased the Cognac color which looks GREAT with a pair of black jeans.The bottom line is that is a high quality belt at a very fair price. Why the average review of this belt is only 4.4 is beyond my ability to understand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product & Company
reviews.reviewText: Always great when you receive something beyond your expectations. The belt s well made, easy to size as they explained and the included hole punch was way COOL~~~ Thanks Again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened the package, I thought it was too red, but I got over it. The belt looks to be very well made. And the color is fine. I purchased the tan color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the first belt my husband has purchased that has been durable and fits comfortably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made casual belt
reviews.reviewText: Full grain leather, nice strong buckle, great workmanship, perfect size! What’s not to like

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a relatively well made belt. It's not too thick or too tall. The color was a bit off from the pictures (more red than brown) but I actually don't dislike that. What I do dislike is the massive buckle. Its a huge chunk of metal and the pictures don't really convey how thick this buckle is. The buckle also curves to try and follow the contour of your body but again its so big that you would have to be a large(wide and tall) individual for it to actually fit properly. Wearing it felt okay but sitting down for long periods is a serious problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wide band, love it, real leather looks great, a little lighter than the photos but not a disappointment.
Excelente producto, execelente calidad...fue para regalo..le encantó...

I love this belt. I am very fussy about my purchases and this belt ranked at the top of check list when it came to great pricing, quality and design. The belt buckle is very well designed and well made and the price compared to other belts I looked at of comparable quality was at least 1/2 as much then. I highly recommend this product. Oh and the addition of the tool to add another hole if needed was a real bonus.
Desde que abres la caja huele a que es totalmente de piel, se siente de excelente calidad, el diseño se me hizo súper bonito, la verdad me encantó
Elije una talla más grande lo común, para q no falle, cómo ventaja se puede recortar la hebilla y el cuero se ve de buena calidad
